maintenance_desc: Enable notifications for upcoming maintenance tasks
support_desc: You will be redirected to the website for general support requests
settingsSaveFailed: Error saving settings. Please try again.
upcoming_maintenance_desc: Receive notifications when a maintenance becomes executable (green)
upcoming_checklist_desc: Receive notifications when a checklist changes state
upcoming_spare_desc: Receive notifications when a spare part needs to be ordered
upcoming_note_impianti_selection: Notifications always respect the equipment selected in the equipment settings screen.
planning_maintenance_desc: Receive the future maintenance plan via email
planning_checklist_desc: Receive the future checklist plan via email
planning_spare_desc: Receive via email the list of spares nearing expiration or needing ordering
planning_note_impianti_selection: Plannings include only the equipment selected in the equipment configuration screen.
